name: Virus Fighter (Alekhin Games)
description:
The world is under attack by an unknown type of virus!

Could it be alien in origin? Who knows...

As health workers and front-liners become occupied and new cases of infection coming in at a daily rate, help is needed.

Their only hope are the volunteers that could help find and kill viruses.

Thankfully, you are here. Help us fight this virus and end them once and for all!

Help save lives. Help save the world!

Play on your browser! or download desktop versions below.
